header.title: I'm Raquel, a developer
header.description: Full-Stack developer with a preference for Front-End. I enjoy creating clear, well-crafted, and user-friendly interfaces. I adapt easily to new environments, enjoy working in teams, and make sure each project progresses successfully. I like learning new things, contributing ideas, and continuously improving both personally and professionally.

experience.title: Web Development
details: Back-End and Front-End development in governmental and biotechnological projects, creating complete and functional web applications.
Front-End with Angular, implementing clear, responsive interfaces and integrating APIs.
Back-End with .NET and C#, implementing server logic, databases, and APIs.

experience.title: Video Games for Game Jams
details: Programmed full video games from scratch in periods of 4 to 7 days.
Promoted teamwork and effective communication within the team.
Solved technical and creative problems, demonstrating adaptability and resilience under pressure.

experience.title: Editorial Illustrations
details: Designed covers, back covers, chapters, and internal visual elements, adapting style to content and author across multiple projects simultaneously.
Used professional image editing and composition software.
Delivered all projects ahead of deadlines, maintaining high quality and visual consistency.

experience.title: Video Game 'Mencia, A Never Was Tale'
details: Programmed in Unity using C#, integrating game mechanics and optimizing performance.
Delivered all artistic elements on time, ensuring quality and visual consistency.
Created 3D models, animations, visual effects, and concept art, applying digital animation and design techniques.

education.degree: Higher Vocational Training in Web Application Development
details: Front-End development with HTML, CSS, and React, creating clear and functional interfaces.
Back-End programming using Java, MariaDB, and MongoDB.
Completed projects integrating databases, views, and libraries, applying best development practices and efficient organization.

education.degree: Higher Vocational Training in 3D Animation for Video Games and Interactive Environments
details: Created 3D animations, models, and interactive environments using professional editing and modeling tools.
Developed projects with specific requirements and tight deadlines, demonstrating autonomy and organization.
Adapted creative processes to different types of projects, maintaining quality and visual consistency.

interests: Programming: I enjoy learning new technologies and experimenting with my own ideas.
Art: I like drawing, exploring styles, and keeping creativity active.
Reading: I read to learn different perspectives, explore cultures, and foster personal growth.
Climbing: It helps me disconnect, stay active, and overcome challenges.
